announcements.details: Read the commentary on the readings for the Christmas Vigil.

announcements.details: There will be ONE mass on Sunday, 28th December, 2025. Offertory will be led by the Friday borns and Legion of Mary. Prayer of the faithful will be led by the Lectors.
announcements.title: Mass Schedule: Feast of the Holy Family of Jesus, Mary and Joseph

announcements.details: The St Bakhita Parish 2026 calendars will be ready by Sunday 21st December. Any additional revenue generated beyond the cost from this year's sales will go directly into donations towards the needy
announcements.title: 2026 Calendar Sales

announcements.details: In His Presence will take place on Sunday 28th December at 6pm. The theme for the evening is 'My Sacrifice of Praise'
announcements.title: In His Presence

announcements.details: Parents and guardians with wards in boarding and tertiary schools are encouraged to submit their details to members of the Formation Team or the Youth Council.
announcements.title: School Visitation Project

events.details: Date: 21st December, 2025 | Time: 4:00pm | Venue: St Bakhita Parish
events.subtitle: Ministering will be the St. Bakhita Day Groups.
